long_description: Becoming a classic mountain essential, the women's DAKINE Heli 11L snow pack features a lightweight, streamlined design to get you and your essentials in position for the ride of your life. Straps let you carry your snowboard vertically in a stable, secure manner on the trek to the top. Curved, foam-padded shoulder straps with sternum strap and padded hipbelt are designed to fit a women's frame; sternum strap buckle doubles as a rescue whistle. Retractable cable carrying straps hold alpine or backcountry skis. Insulated compartment for hydration reservoir (sold separately) and insulated shoulder pads prevent frozen tube, ensuring convenient and reliable hydration. 2 externally-accessible zippered pockets secure gear you want to keep close at hand; includes a fleece-lined goggles pocket to protect your optics.
short_description: Becoming a classic mountain essential, the women's DAKINE Heli 11L snow pack features a lightweight, streamlined design to get you and your essentials in position for the ride of your life.
